TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_lilis, title = lilis, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/lilis} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:邊) amana paceba muisi' i lilis nu zazan. 不要隨便在路邊小便.
(kamo no holam:邊) amana paceba moisi' i lilis no zazan. 不要隨便在路邊小便.
